{"id":314478138,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1584804005,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"712 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/314478138/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Integers by The Power Value","memory":"13 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def getKth(self, lo: int, hi: int, k: int) -> int:\n        \n        ls = []\n        for i in range(lo, hi+1):\n            a = i\n            cnt = 0\n            while a != 1:\n                if a % 2 == 0:\n                    a = a // 2\n                else:\n                    a = a * 3 + 1\n                cnt += 1\n            ls.append([cnt, i])\n        ls = sorted(ls)\n        return ls[k-1][1]\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-integers-by-the-power-value"}
